Game Information:  


Los Santos - city of the sun, starlets and released in the circulation of the stars.
Once the envy of the entire Western world, it is now a haven of crappy reality shows,
suffocating in the grip of economic problems. In the center of the whole mess -
completely different trio of criminals, trying desperately to catch the tail of
luck in the ongoing struggle for a place under the sun. A former member of a street
gang Franklin tries to engage with the past. A retired bank robber Michael discovers
that an honest life is not so rosy as it seemed. Turned to violence crazy Trevor
interrupted by one businessman to another in hope of winning the big jackpot.

Having exhausted the options, the three put their own lives on the line and
commit a series of daring robberies in which - or pan, or missing.

In Grand Theft Auto V fans waiting for not only the most extensive and detailed world
ever created by Rockstar Games, but also the opportunity to influence the lives and
actions of three main characters. This interweaving stories of several characters
will make the game the most fun and exciting.

All attributes of the famous series of fully characterized and Grand Theft Auto V -
here and incredible attention to detail, and the trademark black humor, ridicule and
pop culture, and even brand new, incredibly ambitious multiplayer mode.

RePack Features:  

Grand Theft Auto V
Version of the game - v1.0.331.1 (Update 2)
